nodes.text: The Sentry Droid X-5 was a model of security droid produced by the Okara Droid Company at the Okara Droid Factory on the planet Balmorra. A number of them were used to defend the exterior of the factory during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.
Security Droid BXs appear as enemies in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, where they can be found outside of the Okara Droid Factory on the Imperial version of Balmorra.
